  File "C:\Users\USER\Downloads\renpy-8.3.2-sdk.7z\renpy-8.3.2-sdk\renpy\character.py", line 1334, in sub

    s = interpolate(s, variables) # type: ignore
  File "C:\Users\USER\Downloads\renpy-8.3.2-sdk.7z\renpy-8.3.2-sdk\renpy\substitutions.py", line 86, in interpolate
    raise e
  File "C:\Users\USER\Downloads\renpy-8.3.2-sdk.7z\renpy-8.3.2-sdk\renpy\substitutions.py", line 78, in interpolate
    value = renpy.python.py_eval(code, {}, scope)
  File "C:\Users\USER\Downloads\renpy-8.3.2-sdk.7z\renpy-8.3.2-sdk\renpy\python.py", line 1209, in py_eval
    return py_eval_bytecode(code, globals, locals)
